snippet: Isner powered his way into the semifinals of the Miami Open with a 6-4, 6-3 win Thursday over Kei Nishikori.
abstract: John Isner beats Kei Nishikori, 6-4, 6-3, in Miami Open semifinals; other tennis scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Isner powered his way into the semifinals of the Miami Open with a 6-4, 6-3 win Thursday over Kei Nishikori.

headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Tennis; Isner Reaches Miami Open Semifinals
